title: Device Received
message: Hello {customer_name}, we have received your {device} for repair. Your tracking ID is {tracking_id}. We will update you on the progress soon.

message: Hi {customer_name}, repair work on your {device} (ID: {tracking_id}) has started. Current status: {status}.
